text: Irhab () is a village in northern Syria, administratively part of the Mount Simeon District of the Aleppo Governorate, located west of Aleppo. According to the Syria Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS), it had a population of 110 in the 2004 census.General Census of Population and Housing 2004. Syria Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS). Aleppo Governorate. ==References== Category:Populated places in Mount Simeon District Category:Towns in Aleppo Governorate
title: Irhab, Syria
